description.p: KeyForge Master configurator is a intuitive software that lets you create custom actions and configurations, turning your KeyForge device into a tailoredproductivity powerhouse.

ul.li: Intuitive: Easy to use, clean design. Customize your device in no time.
Versatile: Multiple predefined actions to choose from. Also you can create multiple configurations for every use case.
Complex: You can also create your own custom actions/macros using our drag and drop builder.

description.p: You can create multiple configurations for fun and work in the Settings panel. Switch the active configuration by pressing the SK key on your device or using the Settings panel. You can create your own actions/macros using Actions Forge, our intuitive solution for creating macros, developed to boost your productivity.

ul.li: First app release before the device market release.
You will have access to all the features when the Macropad MK-01 hits the market.
